    • WeatherService

      public WeatherService(double latitude, double longitude, android.app.Activity activity) throws org.json.JSONException, IOException
      Initializes the Weather Service
      Parameters:
      latitude - the user's current latitude (double)
      longitude - the user's current longitude (double)
      activity - the Activity the weather service is used in (Activity)
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException
      IOException
